org.openlcb.can

Class NIDaAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openlcb.can.NIDaAlgorithm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CanFrameListener

    public class NIDaAlgorithm
extends java.lang.Object
implements CanFrameListener
    Implementation of Node ID Alias assignment computation. Provides and processes frames, but other code must move them to and from the actual interface. It also requires subclassing to provide a timer function.
    Author:
    Bob Jacobsen Copyright 2009, 2010
